title: 求大神帮忙解决一下权限问题
author: =w=卖萌=w=
txt_content:
怎么禁止builder组的
back  tpa home  warp 权限？

replies.author: =w=卖萌=w=
replies.txt_content:
qzz740827 发表于 2015-4-14 20:00
在权限里面加入这4行
    - -essentials.back.
    - -essentials.tpa.
前面的呢、能发完整么？谢谢qwq

replies.author: Ir.Nep
replies.txt_content: 就是这样的……这里有帮助大全你可以看一看学习一下http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-292672-1-1.html

replies.author: 筒子
replies.txt_content:
好懒的楼主
/mangaddp builder -essentials.back
/mangaddp builder -essentials.tpa
/mangaddp builder -essentials.home
/mangaddp builder -essentials.warp
